description: The Tind pants has been one of our best selling pieces since it was launched in the Fall 2014. The relaxed, yet elegant off-duty style, seems to be just what people want to wear right now. The fabric is a jacquard structured knit, made with a yarn that's washable on wool setting. Practical and chic! Wear the pants with the matching Tind hoodie.
name: We Norwegians Tind Pants - Mens
